title: Why was the Arcade Poro Icon changed again!?
body:
I purchased the Arcade Boss Key pass to get the poro ward and Icon and since then the Icon has been changed twice. The latest change making the background super bright and ugly. 

I and many others paid for this [Original Icon](https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2017/august/arcade2017event/arcade_poro_icon.png?v=1) and it is no longer what was advertised when I bought it and frankly I want a refund if this issue is not addressed.

[Old and New](https://i.imgur.com/qiv86EK.jpg)

replies.body: I've watched that icon change around 3 times myself tbh >_>. I'm not really sure what happened to the original icon or if it'll these changes will be reverted, but you should this over in [**Report a Bug**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) to try and get the Devs attention to it again.
